data.title: Steve Featherstone

About

Steve Featherstone is a witer and photographer from Syracuse, New York. His stories have appeared in Harper's Magazine, Granta, and Popular Science, and have been featured in Best American Science and Nature Writing. He is working on a book of photography about Joseph Mitchell with author Paul Maliszewski, forthcoming from Princeton Architectural Press.
